question: Which of the following films has been choreographed by Veeru Devgan, who passed away recently?
explanation: Veeru Devgan (85), veteran action choreographer and father of Ajay Devgan, has passed  away in Mumbai, Maharashtra on May 27, 2019. He choreographed action scenes in more than 80 films such as Hindustan Ki Kasam, Mr. India and Mr. Natwarlal  (1993). He also acted in films like Kranti, Saurabh and Singhasan. Recently, he stopped going to film parties, but he was seen at the screening of ‘Total Dhamaal’.
